legacy.name: Legacy
legacy.description: Bonsai styling has been applied, will need design update once we transition to new brand.

released.name: Released
released.description: Live and available for adoption. It has been properly reviewed and QA'd.

in-progress.name: In Progress
in-progress.description: Actively being created, either by the maintainers or a contributor.

planned.name: Planned
planned.description: The component is in an upcoming sprint or there are plans to create it soon.

na.name: N/A, Not Doing
na.description: Not available yet, or it will not be created.

alpha.name: Alpha
alpha.description: Released in Pharos but is not 100% ready for adoption.
